experience.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Performed Root Cause Analysis (RCA) of maritime vessel delays and inefficiencies in report generation.
Automated report generation (Python, SQL), saving 10+ hours of weekly manual work.
Utilized data viz tools (Tableau, Superset) to create interactive dashboards, present findings to the clients.

experience.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Automated report generation for 8 stakeholders (R, SQL), saving 10+ hours of monthly manual work.
Migrated existing data viz source code from legacy version to modern tech stack, 30% increase in efficiency.
Utilized data viz tool (R-Shiny) to create interactive dashboards, present findings to the clients.

research.title: 3D Endoscopy Procedure Reconstruction for VR (WIP)
research.description: Developing a method to reconstruct 3D models of endoscopy procedures for use in virtual reality training.

research.title: Correlated Topic Models: PyTorch Implementation
research.description: Built an open-source implementation of Correlated Topic Models (CTMs) using Automatic Differentiation Variational Inference (ADVI). Achieved 10-15% faster processing times and 8-10% better accuracy for large batch sizes compared to popular libraries.

research.title: Other Research Projects
research.description: Developed and implemented various machine learning models for tasks such as text classification, image recognition, and time series forecasting.
